ticket.title: cache_asset_timestamp accessor not used
ticket.original-body: Tried to stub out cache_asset_timestamp and realized the accessor was not being used and instead the class_variable was referenced inline. This patch just calls the accessor making it easier to stub and allowing further logic in the accessor if required.
